xwikidoc.title: PhenoTips will be part of Google Summer of Code 2013

object.name: Blog.PhenoTips will be part of Google Summer of Code 2013

property.extract:
The [[Centre for Computational Medicine>>http://ccm.sickkids.ca/]] has been accepted as a mentoring organization for [[Google Summer of Code 2013>>http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2013]].
>Google Summer of Code is a global program that offers student developers stipends to write code for various open source software projects. We work with many open source, free software, and technology-related groups to identify and fund projects over a three month period. Since its inception in 2005, the program has brought together nearly 6,000 successful student participants and over 3000 mentors from over 100 countries worldwide, all for the love of code.
PhenoTips is one of the two main projects, along with MedSavant, that will offer projects and mentors this year under the CCM umbrella. The [[proposed projects>>https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/WebHome#HProposedProjects2829]] vary from [[mobile interfaces>>https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Mobile+Web+interface+for+PhenoTips]] and [[advanced visualizations>>https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Visualization+and+analysis+of+patient+data+for+the+diagnosis+of+genetic+disorders]] to [[text processing>>https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Extraction+of+ontology+terms+from+free+form+clinical+notes]] and [[integration with medical ontologies>>https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Real-time+collection+of+clinical+data+on+patients+with+genetic+disorders+using+various+medical+ontologies]].

property.title: PhenoTips will be part of Google Summer of Code 2013
